author: Toby Smith
preview: In the first semester of my second year at university I was tasked with developing a program to control a door keycard entry system for a university in Java.

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is a Unity game which I made as part of the second year of my degree. The objective is to shoot all the targets as quickly as possible.
title: Shooter: Unknown

preview: No full update this week as university work was heavy in other modules – I do however finally have a name for my game!...

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is an Amazon Alexa Skill which tells you the current value of the Bitcoin currency in your Flash Briefing. The current conversion options are GBP, USD, and EUR.
title: Amazon Alexa: Bitcoin Value

preview: Initial progress has been quick as I managed to add all the controls to my player while I was testing ideas. Currently the player....

author: Toby Smith
preview: As this game is made for one of my university modules I’m also making documentation for it to be submitted. Today I handed in a proposal document for my game and I decided to also publish it here.

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is an Amazon Alexa skill which tells you what the status is of each London tube and train is line by reporting any delays, closures, and updates and a brief and concise manner.
title: Amazon Alexa: London Tube Statuses

skill.searchTerm: London Tube and Train Line Statuses

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is an Amazon Alexa skill which tells you the pollen levels local to you in the UK during your flash briefing. Like all other flash briefing skills, it can be reordered in either the Alexa app or on the website.
title: Amazon Alexa: Daily Pollen Levels

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is an Amazon Alexa skill which tells you a daily horoscope for any of the 12 zodiac signs during your flash briefing. Like all other flash briefing skills, it can be reordered in either the Alexa app or on the website.
title: Amazon Alexa: Daily Horoscope

author: Toby Smith
preview: This is an Amazon Alexa skill which tells you the current moon phase during your flash briefing.
title: Amazon Alexa: Current Moon Phase

author: Toby Smith
preview: I made this as part of my university course: Computer Science and Video Games Development, and was for the first year module AINT152.
title: Apocalypse Z

author: Toby Smith
preview: This project was made as part of my university course: Computer Science and Video Games Development, and was for the module SOFT152. This program takes data files containing sales records and represents the data in 5 different graphs.
title: Data Miner
